channel.title: Aboutme on chryb's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aboutme on chryb's blog

item.title: Why so expensive?
item.description: I’m curious about the prices for some markdown editors at the app store. So I made my own one (and because I have the core from my previous project Stack). If you look some projects on the app store for example They are good, no question caret ulyssis marked - Features file system support

item.title: Let's Get Started
item.description: Hello, my name is Christoph Biering. I’m here to start a blog about programming, nerdy stuff and my side projects. But first of all, I will write a bit about me and why I’m creating a blog. Don’t be too hard to me. I’m not a native English speaker. I’m not a professional writer nor a person of many words and I don’t even think that I’m good at writing at all.
